name: Community Legal Services in East Palo Alto
description: Free legal services for low-income families including immigration, housing, workers' rights, record clearance, and consumer protection
fullDescription: Community Legal Services in East Palo Alto (CLSEPA) provides free legal assistance to low-income families in San Mateo County and surrounding areas.
whatTheyOffer:
- Immigration legal services (family petitions, DACA, citizenship)
- Housing and tenant rights assistance
- Workers' rights and wage theft claims
- Criminal record clearance (expungement)
- Consumer protection
- Community education workshops
howToGetIt:
1. Call CLSEPA or visit their website to schedule an appointment
2. Complete intake and financial eligibility screening
3. Must meet income guidelines (generally 200% FPL or below)
4. Attend initial consultation with staff attorney
5. Receive ongoing representation if case is accepted
address: 1861 Bay Road, East Palo Alto, CA 94303
keywords: CLSEPA, East Palo Alto, immigration, tenant rights, housing, wage theft, workers rights, expungement, record clearance, criminal record, consumer protection, free legal, San Mateo
